db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [restricted-type] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: You can't access an unscoped enum from here
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You accessed the value of an enum defined in C++ by its enum type name.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Unscoped enums defined in C++ can't be accessed by their enum type name. They will be undefined at runtime.
